home.title:
Stick the Rhythm,
Master the Fluency.
home.subtitle: AI-powered language learning through your favorite music videos.

player.load_lyrics_msg: Load lyrics to see artist info
player.no_lyrics_desc: Search for the song lyrics to start your practice session.

search.title: Search Lyrics
search.empty_state: Start by searching for a song.

curator.api_key_desc:
To use the AI Curator, you need a Google Gemini API key.
Your key is stored locally in your browser.
curator.mode_desc: Generate synchronized lyrics for this video using Gemini 1.5 Flash.
curator.generating: AI is generating lyrics and pronunciation...
curator.confirm_sync_save: Apply sync shift of {{defaultValue}} to all lyrics?

lyrics.no_song: No song loaded. Provide a YouTube link to start.

wizard.title: Register New Song
wizard.ai_desc: Use AI to automatically generate Pronunciation and Meaning for your lyrics.
wizard.wait_msg: This process may take up to 30 seconds.
wizard.quota_exceeded: Free quota exceeded (10 songs). Please add your own Gemini API Key in Settings to continue.
wizard.config_error: Platform configuration error: No Platform API Key available. Please contact support.

auth.reg_success_desc: We've sent a confirmation link to your email. Please click the link to complete your registration.
auth.already_registered: This email is already registered. Please sign in.
auth.already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.email_not_confirmed: Email not confirmed. Please check your inbox.
auth.no_account: Don't have an account? Sign up

library.title: Library
library.empty_my: Your library is empty. Try creating a song or adding favorites from the public library!
library.empty_public: Public Library is Empty. Be the first to share a completed song!
library.empty_fav: No favorites yet. Go explore the public library!
